QuestData.Title: Precious Baby
QuestData.Description:
You there, $pr! Are you semi-competent?
Do you have your priorities in check?
Good!
My precious Baby is missing. Save her immediately. Be quick about it, she can't fend for herself in these horrible conditions.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Elzara ignores you and looks at Baby.>
Are you safe, my precious cuddlemuffin?
Did the Primalists bleed on you? How dare they!
<Elzara notices you.>
I shall definitely be rating this spa at one star. I expect a blood-free experience.
